Record.ClassificationPath: Male Urogenital Diseases/Genital Diseases, Male/Sexual Dysfunction, Physiological/Erectile Dysfunction/Impotence, Vasculogenic
Record.Description: Inability to achieve and maintain an erection (ERECTILE DYSFUNCTION) due to defects in the arterial blood flow to the PENIS, defect in venous occlusive function allowing blood drainage (leakage) from the erectile tissue (corpus cavernosum penis), or both.
